resources.string: Press on color below to apply
Configure what icons are shown on status bar
No Need, Development settings are enabled by default.
Enable dial tones when using the phone
Enable sound when locking or unlocking phone
Enable sound whenever phone is plugged in
Enable sound whenever screen is touched
Enable vibration whenever phone is touched
An error occurred.\n\nPlease check for root access. To activate go into superuser settings and enable root access.
Changing your default LCD density can sometimes cause certain apps to not function properly and/or the playstore to show apps being incompatible with your device
Tablets generally use 160 dpi while high end devices use 320 or 480 dpi. Older devices use 240 dpi
You need to reboot your device for your change to take effect
Changing your default LCD density can sometimes cause certain apps to not function properly and/or the playstore to show apps being incompatible with your device"
To add a custom per-app configuration for expanded state, set "Enabled for all" to the off position
Choose a default expanded desktop style
Hide the status bar or navigation bar or both
Abbreviated day of the week before the time
Display custom date before the clock
Must be in DateFormat eg. MM/dd/yy
Show notifications from this app on the lockscreen
Never show ongoing notifications from this app on the lockscreen
Double tap status bar to put device to sleep
Double tap navigation bar to put device to sleep
Double tap anywhere on lockscreen to put device to sleep
Landscape keyboard will never take up entire screen
Force auto-rotate when keyboard is shown
Disables auto-rotate sensor %1$s seconds after keyboard is hidden
This feature forces auto-rotate to turn on temporarily while the keyboard is shown. It has no effect when auto-rotate is already enabled.
Force keyboard to show enter instead of emoticon key
Display left and right cursor buttons in navigation bar while typing. Longpress to navigate up/down. Overrides IME switcher and menu buttons.
Show unaccounted and overcounted usage in battery statistics.
Maximum entries size has been reached
It is not possible to delete last entry
It is not possible to delete required buttons
Disabled\nAdd an entry to enable this feature
The chosen app did not return a valid icon or does not support image cropping. Use another app.
The chosen action cannot be added twice
, while selecting the icon will bring up customization options

To add a %1$s, select the Add icon. Once a %1$s is added, selecting the row will change the target%2$s

To remove a %1$s, swipe the row horizontally left or right. Re-order a %1$s in the list by vertically dragging the anchor on the left.

To clear or reset to defaults, select the Reset icon.
Removing every %1$s in the list will disable the feature entirely.
Removing every %1$s in the list will disable the second pie layer entirely.
You have no button assigned any more to the \"Home\" action!\n\nThis can make your device unusable!
You have no button assigned any more to the \"Back\" action!\n\nThis can make your device unusable!
Reassigning "Home" button is not permitted !\n\nThis would make your device unusable!
Reassigning "Back" button is not permitted !\n\nThis would make your device unusable!

You may not remove the "Home" button action,
it has been readded as last entry!

This would make your device unusable!

it has been readded as last entry!

This can make your device unusable!
Configure the entries to show in power menu (up to 6)

Where do you want the menu buttons to appear?
How and when do you want the menu buttons to appear?
Navigation bar height while in portrait.
Navigation bar height while in landscape.
Navigation bar height if the bar is along a side.
Shows navigation bar in landscape on the bottom
Configure the buttons to show on navigation bar
Reset all dimensions entries to default?
Reset all style entries to default?
Dim navigation bar buttons after not interacting with navigation bar for a specified time
Time (in milliseconds) to wait before dimming buttons
Alpha value to dim buttons to
Duration (in milliseconds) of the alpha animation
Listen for touches on entire screen
Touching anywhere on the screen will cause buttons to un-dim
Only touches on the navbar will cause buttons to un-dim
Change the navigation bar button color mode
Blocking wakelocks have the potential to cause instability, crashes or data loss
Show Google search bar in the recents screen
Show a bar with the device\'s available memory
Include foreground task when clearing all
Allow override of default values with user config
Pulse will be triggered by pick up sensor
Pick up sensor will not be utilized as a trigger
Pulse will be triggered by notifications
Notifications will not be utilized as a trigger
Notifications will not be inverted. Use for dark themes.
Notifications will be inverted. Use for light/stock theme.
Require a double-tap to wake the device on a doze pulse screen
Require a simple-tap to wake the device on a doze pulse screen (default)
Scramble PIN layout when unlocking device
Unlock automatically when the correct PIN/password is entered
Adjust brightness by sliding across the status bar
Change the shortcuts on lockscreen to whatever you want
Disabling the camera shutter sound is illegal in some areas! Please check the applicable law in your country
Plays sound effect when screenshot is taken
Display a notification when USB debugging is connected
Could not load %s. Make sure you have storage available.
Adjust the width of the trigger area
Adjust the vertical postion of the trigger area
Adjust the height of the trigger area
Battery icon will show up where the clear all button shows up
Battery bar position and color customization
The charging animation may result in a poor user experience. Enable at your own discretion.
Duration (in milliseconds) of the above-selected system animations
Disables transition animations such as when launching an app
This will hide all force close notificaitons
Available only for apps that support expanded notifications
Display extra info for cpu, display, etc
Add, remove, and position items in the sidebar

Display a visible tab on the side which will display the sidebar when touched.
Display the tab on the top, middle, or bottom on the side of the screen.
Change the size of the visible tab.
Adjust the width of the trigger area

Adjust the height of the trigger area
Multiple activities on screen at the same time.

WARNING: This is a highly experimental feature that allows multiple activities on-screen at the same time through the Recent apps UI. Some apps may crash or not function correctly when used with this feature.
Scrolling cache may improve scrolling performance at the cost of memory
Use OmniSwitch instead of default recents view
Make sure you have enabled OmniSwitch. You can do this by using \"Settings\" below
Show a brightness icon to the left of the brighness slider to adjust auto-brightness
Show a brightness slider in the quick settings panel
Don\'t exclude the topmost task in recents view
Show recent apps panel on the left edge
Show app shortcuts on the other edge
Enable TCP/IP debugging over network interfaces (Wi-Fi, USB networks). This setting is reset on reboot

WARNING: When ADB over network is enabled, your phone is open for intrusions on all connected networks, including GSM data network!

Only use this feature when you are connected on trusted networks.

Do you really want to enable this function?
Turn the screen on when connecting or disconnecting a power source
When screen off, long-pressing the volume rockers will skip music tracks
Swap volume buttons logically according to screen rotation
You don\'t have any blocked numbers. Add an entry by touching the Add (+) button.
To prevent phone numbers from calling or messaging you, enable the blocked caller list.
You will not receive incoming calls or messages from phone numbers on the blocked caller list
Don\'t block calls from private numbers
Don\'t block calls or messages from numbers not in the contact list
Block incoming %s from numbers not in the contact list
Use . as a wildcard and * for repetition. E.g. 123.* blocks numbers starting with 123 and .*123.* blocks numbers containing 123
Unable to add invalid phone number to blocked caller list
Do you want to remove this blocked phone number?
Control apps permissions with more power
Are you sure you wish to reset counters?
The chamber of secrets has opened
Two main tiles on the first row
Three or four tiles on each row
Controls the quick settings edit icon in the drawer
Choose apps which do not appear in recents panel
See some of the recent commits.
Change the number of columns displayed in the dashboard
Show dashboard tile titles in 2 lines
Show dashboard tile titles in 1 line
Check the proximity sensor prior to waking up screen
Battery history stats are going to be reset
For better visibility on bright images
Enable notification panel header weather display
Right edge of the status bar pulls down Quick Settings

Whether to allow global use of float mode, if this is off none of the below options will work DUH!!!
Launch Slim & Pie Actions in Floating Window Mode
Launch Gesture Anywhere shortcuts in float mode

Change the button icon color mode
To avoid conflicts with status bar or navigation bar, the triggers on these edges are automatically turned off if one or both are available
Mirror right pie on the horizontal axis
Shows snap points to change the trigger edge dynamically
Shows phone status, time and date information
No other navigation is currently enabled. Turning off pie controls can result in an unusable device. Do you want to enable navigation bar instead?
Minimum one of the main triggers (bottom, left or right) needs to be enabled.
Reduces left and right trigger size if keyboard is active
No other navigation is currently enabled. Turning off the navigation bar can result in an unusable device. Do you want to enable pie controls instead?
Set custom animations for system keyboard
Show an editor window after taking a screenshot in order to do some operations like cropping, saving or sharing it
Always use the cropped image inside the cropping area, even if the apply button hasn\'t been pressed
Hide the traffic monitor when there is no activity
Hide the network traffic indicator arrows
Enable media cover art on the lockscreen
Please enter a new label. Leave blank to revert to stock label.
